project.master-blacksmith.title: Master Blacksmith
project.master-blacksmith.description: Master Blacksmith - is a promo website for a blacksmith workshop. The page showcases various types of metal structures: from canopies and gazebos to fences and decorative elements. I focused on a clean structure, convenient navigation, and large visual blocks so that users can quickly browse products, choose the right category, and submit a request for manufacturing.
project.rivo-agency.title: Rivo Agency
project.rivo-agency.description: A multi-page website for a creative digital agency. In this project I started working with the React library: implemented functional and class components, routing with BrowserRouter, and navigation logic. Forms are handled with Formik. The layout is recreated from Figma with pixel-perfect precision.
project.future-tech.title: Future Tech
project.future-tech.description: A multi-page website built from a Figma layout. The markup follows the BEM methodology. I use the Sass (SCSS) preprocessor, modular styles, and adaptive rem units. Additional JavaScript logic is responsible for interactive elements and smooth user experience.
project.four-horses-club.title: Four Horses Club
project.four-horses-club.description: An adaptive landing page with clean semantics and BEM markup. The project uses the Sass (SCSS) preprocessor, modular style structure, and adaptive rem-based typography. There is a lot of JavaScript: smooth anchor scrolling, a running line, a carousel of participants with pagination, stage-switch tabs, and state management through data attributes. Accessibility is implemented with ARIA roles, aria-live regions, and lazy-loaded images.
project.hydra.title: Hydra
project.hydra.description: A landing page with a futuristic design and neon accents. Built with SCSS, a modular structure, and responsive typography. Includes interactive sections, animated blocks, and smooth transitions between content sections.
project.celestia.title: Celestia
project.celestia.description: A cosmic-themed landing with neon gradients and deep space atmosphere. The layout is built with SCSS and adaptive typography. The page uses glowing gradients, starry backgrounds, and smooth animated transitions between sections to create a futuristic space mood.
project.Generator Polygons.title: Generator Polygons
project.Generator Polygons.description: Web application in pure JavaScript that generates a set of random polygons. The created shapes can be dragged to the second workspace and freely moved, building a composition. The project shows work with Canvas/graphics, drag & drop and event handling without frameworks.
project.Kaskad Davtian.title: Kaskad & Davtian
project.Kaskad Davtian.description:
Corporate website for a construction company with two directions:
Kaskad — construction, landscaping and infrastructure projects
Davtian Architects — an architectural studio and in-house design department.
The main concept is a full-cycle, turnkey approach: from design and planning to the final construction stage.
I implemented the UI with the brand colors (brown for Kaskad and emerald for Davtian), integrated Strapi CMS, built the API and database layer, and set up a convenient system for adding and managing projects.
The solution is fast, stable, and easy to update via the admin panel.
project.Blossom.title: Blossom
project.Blossom.description:
E-commerce website for selling curtains, built on the InSales platform.
I developed and configured the project fully turnkey: from the product catalog structure to the final checkout flow.
A custom price calculator was implemented, allowing customers to calculate the product cost based on dimensions and parameters.
CDEK delivery service was fully integrated, along with payment methods and order processing logic.
The product database, categories and attributes were fully structured and configured.
The solution is ready for scaling and easy to manage through the administrative panel.
project.Aiscreen.title: AIScreen
project.Aiscreen.description:
Corporate website for an advanced digital signage platform.
I fully implemented the website turnkey using WordPress: from structure and visual presentation to content management and performance optimization.
The site showcases a powerful digital signage solution that turns any TV into a managed screen without additional hardware.
I structured and presented complex product features including template libraries, app integrations, split-screen zones, device management, and real-time content updates.
The project highlights cross-platform support, cloud-based screen control, and enterprise-ready functionality.
The website is optimized for scalability, easy content updates, and clear communication of the product’s value to businesses worldwide.
project.Modular Buildings.title: Modular Buildings
project.Modular Buildings.description:
Corporate website for a company specializing in modular buildings made from shipping containers.
The project was fully implemented turnkey on the Tilda platform: from page structure and content logic to final visual presentation.
I designed the project logo and visual identity, built a clear commercial narrative, and highlighted the key advantages of the technology.
The website presents various use cases including technical facilities, construction site headquarters, dormitories, offices, and modular complexes.
Special focus is placed on comparing container-based modules with traditional prefab cabins, emphasizing durability, airtight construction, repeated transportation, and fast installation.
The project communicates a full-cycle construction approach — from design and documentation to construction and commissioning.
